items.headline: Netflix set to transform media business — and itself — with $83 billion Warner Bros. deal
items.summary_en: Netflix will become a vastly bigger and different company once its deal to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery’s studio and streaming businesses goes through.

items.headline: Even Paramount now thinks Netflix is winning the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery
items.summary_en: Paramount Skydance had been considered the front-runner in the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery, but signaled on Thursday that it felt it was losing to Netflix in a process it deemed unfair.
